text: (Pin, tan etirparttatarku maraka) aval oru pen kulantaiyaip perratum; "en iraivane! Nan oru pennaiye perrirukkinren" enak kuriyataiyum ninaivu kurunkal;. Aval perretuttatai allah nankarivan;. An, pennaip polalla. (Melum antattay connal;)"avalukku maryam enru peyarittullen;. Innum avalaiyum, aval cantatiyaiyum virattappatta saittani(n tinkukali)liruntu kapparrat titamaka unnitam kaval tetukinren
